node.excerpt: On Friday of last week I unexpectedly got a text from Vodafone saying I was able to upgrade my phone early. I was pretty pleased about this…
While I was very pleased to get a proper Linux distro working on my Pogoplug, the Arch-based Plugbox Linux was never really my cup of tea…
For a while now I've wanted a home server of some description, the idea being that it was something I could use to run a web server for…
Just to say I've changed the contact form I use on here. I always wanted to use one with a built-in CAPTCHA facility, as Disqus seems to…
Yesterday I realised that I had somehow managed to scatter Vim swap files all across the Dropbox folder I use to share Perl and Python…

frontmatter.title: Deleting unwanted Vim swap files using Perl
